Reference

Disease-specific utilities

read_inpatient_data()

Reads in inpatient HODaR data

read_survey_data()

Reads in survey HODaR data

merge_data()

Merge the inpatient and survey HODaR data together

MeanAge_Sex()

Calculate mean age and proportion of males for each condition in HODAR

lkup

lkup data with alcohol and tobacco-related conditions and ICD-10 codes

Collapse_adm_survey()

Collapse admissions into surveys

CalcUtils()

Calculate the average utility for each alcohol/tobacco-related condition

Adj_cond_utils()

Adjust the condition-specific utility for age and sex

General population utilities

GenPopUtil

General population utilities
